data.title: Jermaine Dupri Announces So So Def Anniversay Tour Featuring Bow Wow, Xscape, Da Brat & More
data.meta_description: The label celebrates its 25th anniversary with a tour and a compilation album.
data.text:
Jermaine Dupri just announced his label's anniversary tour. So So Def Records, which was founded in 1993, is turning 25 and Dupri is making sure it's honored in style with "The Cultural Curren$y Tour." Many fan favorites will join the label owner/producer. Bow Wow, Youngbloodz, Da Brat and Dem Franchize Boyz are part of the lineup. Soul singer Anthony Hamilton and chart-topping RnB groups Xscape and Jagged Edge are part of the crew as well as many others.

The tour is set to kick off in the fall, starting in Washington D.C. on October 14 and ending in Los Angeles on November 2. Tickets will be available as of August 3.

https://www.instagram.com/p/Bl3DMqHF8Ha

Jermaine Dupri is excited about his creation, having stated that "Blessings are bigger when you share them. One of my biggest blessings is to be able to go tour with all my artists. I can't wait!!!"

Dupri also assembled a compilation album in honor of the celebration by releasing Jermaine Dupri Presents So So Def 25 in collaboration with Sony Classics. He curated iconic tracks such as Da Brat's "Funkdafied", Xscape's "Just Kickin' It", Dupri's own "Money Aint A Thang (feat. Jay-Z)." The album also includes rare tracks that feature Kanye West and The Notorious B.I.G.

Tour Dates

10/14 - Washington, DC - Capital One Arena

10/18 - Brooklyn, NY - Barclays Center

10/19 - Baltimore, MD - Royal Farms Arena

10/20 - Greensboro, NC - Coliseum

10/21 - Atlanta, GA - Philips Arena

TBD - Chicago, IL - United Center

10/25 - Nashville, TN - Bridgestone Arena

10/26 - Memphis, TN - FedExForum

10/28 - Charlotte, NC - Spectrum Center

10/31 - Detroit, MI - Little Caesars Arena

11/2 - Los Angeles, CA - Staples Center
